enWisdom: Wealth is the object of desires
Wealth corrupts the outcomes and extends the [false] hopes
Wealth is the tribulation of the soul and the plunder of calamities

Wisdom: رُبَّ غَنِيٍّ أَذَلُّ مِنْ نَقَدٍ [مِنْ فَقِيرٍ]
enWisdom: At times a rich person may be lowlier than an ugly sheep

Wisdom: كَثْرَةُ الْمَالِ تُفْسِدُ الْقُلُوبَ وَتُنْشِئُ [يُنْسِي‏] الذُّنُوبَ
enWisdom: Increased wealth corrupts the hearts and gives rise to sins

Wisdom: مَنْ كَرُمَ عَلَيْهِ الْمَالُ هَانَتْ عَلَيْهِ الرِّجَالُ
enWisdom: One who considers wealth to be precious, regards people as insignificant

Wisdom: رُوِيَ أَنَّهُ ع مَرَّ عَلَى مَزْبَلَةٍ فَقَالَ هَذَا مَا كُنْتُمْ عَلَيْهِ بِالْأَمْسِ تَتَنَافَسُونَ
enWisdom: While passing by some filth in a cesspit, he (‘a) said: This is what you were competing for yesterdayAnd in another narration, he said: This is what the misers were stingy with
